pr_title: Allow listener to be null in collection task

timeline.message:
Allow listener to be null in collection task

This will allow to avoid forcing the use of an actual listener when no
action are required before/after

timeline.bodyText: useful future-proofing trick on this one - if you annotate the Listener argument here with @Nullable (from androidx.annotation package I believe) then Android studio will help programmers later by highlighting when mListener might be null but isn't null-checked yet in the code.
timeline.author: mikehardy

replies.bodyText: I pushed in a next commit, hoping it's correct
replies.author: Arthur-Milchior
